comment.author: 11572312@N00
comment._content: Sam Felton was a punter for Harvard football and also a pitcher on the baseball team (see 1911 NYTimes articles).

comment.author: 12103981@N03
comment._content: Looks like it might be one of a number of games between between Yale and Harvard -- Gardner might refer to Gardner Philbin (QB, at Harvard) but based on the photo looks like it might be Sam Felton (Left end, Harvard). (Game November 24, 1912). Base on when the recent batch of photos was uploaded this is out of a trove of 1912 photos from Bain News Service. query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?_r=1&res=9E06E...

comment.author: 76041334@N00
comment._content: I love these old football pictures!

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Not a game, but a Harvard football practice session, one of several sessions from which Bain/LOC photos have been posted on Flickr. Here's another one:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2387988190/]

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: Thanks to all for the comments. There is another photograph in the Bain collection of Gardner (identified as quarterback Harry Gardner by another commenter) here. This caption of 'Gardner and Felton' was applied to both photographs based on the caption card information, but we will make it more clear when we update that this photograph is only Sam Felton and the other image is Harry Gardner.
